title: 291: Getting to REALLY Know Hunter Montgomery
itunes:title: 291: Getting to REALLY Know Hunter Montgomery
description:
The Broads are joined by the one and only Hunter Montgomery (Katie’s Bachelorette Season)! They spend some time getting to know who he really is and what he wishes the Bachelorette audience would have seen. They discuss his journey to sobriety, some of his and Katie’s unseen moments, how he really felt about her, being know as the “Bachelor Historian” of the house and that backlash, his vulnerability on the show discussing his divorce and children, and Tourette syndrome. Then they throw in some rapid fire superlatives Hunter gives the men from his season! You won’t want to miss getting to know Hunter better!

HUNTER MONTGOMERY:

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/hmontgomery/

TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@hmontgomery86?

Twitter: https://twitter.com/hmontgomery86

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:***PLUSHCARE: Go to PLUSCHARE.COM/CHATTY to start your FREE 30-day trial!***GREEN CHEF:  Go to GREENCHEF.COM/CHATTY100 and use code CHATTY100 to get $100 off including free shipping! ***HELIX SLEEP: Helix is offering up to $200 off all mattress orders AND 2 free pillows for our listeners at HELIXSLEEP.COM/CHATTY***FORIA: Get 20% off your first order by visiting WWW.FORIAWELLNESS.COM/CHATTY or use code CHATTY at checkout!

 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
